Description:
Preparing 2D drawings and 3D CAD models with the help of suitable interior designing software and tools.
Design presentation for internal and external Review.
Study design plans and order required components from designated vendors without any delay.
Assess the existing budget to decide on project charges and define the overall cost estimates.
Research and follow industry changes, evolutions and best practisesSkills
Skills:
Well-versed in planning and implementation of interior design projects on a professional level.
Proficient in implementing the various phases of interior design, from programming to project administration.
Hands-on expertise in using interior design tools and software.
Collection of all the different interior designing assignments and projects in soft or hard copy form.
Proficient in presenting design concepts through proper choice of communication channels.
Bachelor's degree in Interior Design from a reputed educational institute.
